title: Why can't I resize my screen when in fullscreen on Youtube?
content:
I cannot resize the window using the "brackets", I have to close the video.  It's like the edges of the screen are non-responsive.  Please help! 

I recently moved from a Pixel 3 to a Pixel 5 and the user experience is not as good as a result. (this "edge of the screen is not responsive to touch" problem has happened a few times.
